ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B RBSPICE Low Energy Resolution Electron Rates converted Level-3 data
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains Van Allen Probe B RBSPICE (Radiation Belt Storm Probes Ion Composition Experiment) low-energy resolution electron rates that are measured at high-time resolution. Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux (FEDU) measured by 6 telescopes in 14 channels from ~0.02-1.0 MeV are available in physical units (counts/(s*sr*cm^2*MeV) by telescope in sector order (T0= ~110 PA, T3= ~all PAs, T5= FEDU background). Also available are percentage error of measurement, quality flag, current sector number where each spin is dividied into 36 sectors, duration of the accumulation, current spin number of the spacecraft, orbit number, dipole L using the SM reference frame, and position of the spacecraft in SM coordinates. Level 3 data include all level 2 data plus spacecraft positions, pitch angles of the six telecopses, and derived magnetic field values. The processing is done in a series of algorithmic steps in which the EMFISIS (Electric and Magnetic Field Instrument Suite and Integrated Science) magnetic field data is loaded, the ECT (Energetic Particle, Composition and Thermal Plasma Suite) magnetic ephemeris data is loaded, the Level 2 intensity data file is copied, and the pitch angles are calculated and placed into the copied Level 2 file, creating a Level 3 file.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NASA Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF) CDAWeb.

Parameter.Name: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Ephemeris Time of the start of the accumulation for this measurement.
Parameter.Caveats: This is the Ephemeris Time saved as a TT2000 CDF Variable. The difference between the ET value and the TT value is less than a millisecond. The ET time values have an accuracy of no greater than 3 milliseconds hence it was determined that there was no reason to convert the ET values into TT.

Parameter.Name: UTC
Parameter.Description: UTC

Parameter.Name: SCLOCK_Full
Parameter.Description: SCLOCK_Full

Parameter.Name: ET
Parameter.Description: The ephemeris time at the start of the measurement.

Parameter.Name: MidET
Parameter.Description: The ephemeris time at the mid-point of the measurement. For multi-spin measurements the midET is centered so that it properly represents the time to be used to calculate the look direction of the instrument.

Parameter.Name: StopET
Parameter.Description: The ephemeris time at the end of the accumulation of the measurement

Parameter.Name: Telescope No.
Parameter.Description: Identifies the telescope used to collect the measurement

Parameter.Name: Channel
Parameter.Description: Identifies the channel used to collect the measurement

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Energy
Parameter.Description: Midpoint energy of the measurement channel. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

Parameter.Name: FEDU
Parameter.Description: FEDU: Electron flux spectrograms in energy, by telescope in sector order (T0= ~110 PA, T3= ~all PAs, T5= FEDU background)

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Telescope1
Parameter.Description: Telescope 1: stacked plots by energy

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Telescope2
Parameter.Description: -----> Telescope 2

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Telescope3
Parameter.Description: -----> Telescope 3

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Telescope2
Parameter.Description: -----> Telescope 4

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Telescope2
Parameter.Description: -----> Telescope 5

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Telescope6
Parameter.Description: -----> Telescope 6

Parameter.Name: FEDU
Parameter.Description: Telescope-energy images

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Error
Parameter.Description: The percentage error of the measurement.

Parameter.Name: FIDU_Crosscalib_RMSE
Parameter.Description: RMS Error of the natural log of the flux for each channel.
Parameter.Caveats: This error value includes all errors associated with the measurement including cross calibration errors

Parameter.Name: FEDU_Quality
Parameter.Description: Quality flag for the measurement for each telescope/channel/timestep. .see PREBM standards for definition

Parameter.Name: Sector
Parameter.Description: The current sector number where each spin is divided into 36 sectors.

Parameter.Name: Duration
Parameter.Description: Duration of the accumulation.

Parameter.Name: Spin
Parameter.Description: The current spin number of the spacecraft

Parameter.Name: FPDU_Energy
Parameter.Description: Midpoint energy of the measurement channel. A value of -1 indicates that an energy definition for this channel is not applicable

Parameter.Name: FDPU_EnergyRange
Parameter.Description: Minimum and Maximum energy of the measurement channel. A value of -1 indicates that either an energy definition for this channel is not applicable or that the upper end of the channel is undefined - i.e. the channel becomes integral.

Parameter.Name: Position_SM
Parameter.Description: Position of the spacecraft in SM coordinates

Parameter.Name: Position_GEO
Parameter.Description: Position of the SC in the GEO Reference Frame.

Parameter.Name: Position_GSM
Parameter.Description: Position of the SC in the GSM Reference Frame.

Parameter.Name: Position_Quality
Parameter.Description: The position quality flag, 0=good, 1=bad.

Parameter.Name: OrbitNumber
Parameter.Description: Orbit Number at the time of the measurement

Parameter.Name: L
Parameter.Description: Dipole L value calculated using the SM Reference Frame

Parameter.Name: L_Eq
Parameter.Description: McElqain L value calculated at the Equator (derived from ECT MagEphem data).

Parameter.Name: L_Star
Parameter.Description: Roeder's L* value (derived from ECT MagEphem data) for the average pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: I
Parameter.Description: Integral invariant for the average pitch angle derived from ECT MagEphem data.

Parameter.Name: K
Parameter.Description: The Second Invariant ( I*sqrt(Bm) ) for the average pitch angle derived from ECT MagEphem data.

Parameter.Name: MLT
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Local Time of S/C in Centerted Dipole Coordinates derived from ECT MagEphem data.

Parameter.Name: FEDU_AlphaValue
Parameter.Description: The pitch angle based upon the look direction of each telescope, alpha=cos-1(B*(-look))

Parameter.Name: FEDU_AlphaRangeValue
Parameter.Description: The range of the pitch angle (min, max) for each of the pitch angles, Alpha.

Parameter.Name: AlphaValue
Parameter.Description: The pitch angle based upon the look direction of each telescope, alpha=cos-1(B*(-look)).

Parameter.Name: Alpha_Quality
Parameter.Description: A flag describing the Quality of the Pitch Angle as calculated, 0=good, 1=bad.

Parameter.Name: LStarValue
Parameter.Description: Roeder's L* value (derived from ECT MagEphem data) for each of the telescopes based upon the telescope pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: I_InvValue
Parameter.Description: The Integral invariant for the pitch angle of each telescope derived from ECT MagEphem data.

Parameter.Name: K_InvValue
Parameter.Description: Second Invariant ( I*sqrt(Bm) ) for the pitch angle of each telescope derived from ECT MagEphem data.

Parameter.Name: MinMax
Parameter.Description: Range variable for the minimum/maximum values of the PitchAngle Range

Parameter.Name: Position_SM
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Position of the spacecraft in SM coordinates

Parameter.Name: Position_GEO
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Position of the SC in the GEO Reference Frame.

Parameter.Name: Position_GSM
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Position of the SC in the GSM Reference Frame.

Parameter.Name: OrbitNumber
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Orbit Number at the time of the measurement

Parameter.Name: L
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Dipole L value calculated using the SM Reference Frame

Parameter.Name: L_Eq
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] McElqain L value calculated at the Equator (derived from ECT MagEphem data).

Parameter.Name: L_Star
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Roeder's L* value(derived from ECT MagEphem data) for the average pitch angle.

Parameter.Name: I
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Integral invariant for the average pitch angle derived from ECT MagEphem data.

Parameter.Name: K
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] The Second Invariant ( I*sqrt(Bm) ) for the average pitch angle derived from ECT MagEphem data.

Parameter.Name: MLT
Parameter.Description: [Labels on plots] Magnetic Local Time of S/C in Centerted Dipole Coordinates derived from ECT MagEphem data.
